mapper.update: update CRM_CUSTOM_BASIC_INFO set WEIXIN_ACCNT = #{weixinAccnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIXIN_NAME = #{weixinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WANGWANG_ACCNT = #{wangwangAccnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_PERSON = #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NUMBER = #{contactNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORPORATION = #{corporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORPORATION_NUMBER = #{corporationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOM_LEVEL = #{customLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOM_NAME = #{customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CUSTOM_ID = #{customId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select CUSTOM_ID, WEIXIN_ACCNT, WEIXIN_NAME, WANGWANG_ACCNT, CONTACT_PERSON, CONTACT_NUMBER, CORPORATION, CORPORATION_NUMBER, CUSTOM_LEVEL, CUSTOM_NAME, IS_VALID, UPDATE_DATE from CRM_CUSTOM_BASIC_INFO where CUSTOM_ID = #{customId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select CUSTOM_ID, WEIXIN_ACCNT, WEIXIN_NAME, WANGWANG_ACCNT, CONTACT_PERSON, CONTACT_NUMBER, CORPORATION, CORPORATION_NUMBER, CUSTOM_LEVEL, CUSTOM_NAME, IS_VALID, UPDATE_DATE from CRM_CUSTOM_BASIC_INFO
